      • Agent

        public Agent(Grid g,
     java.awt.Color c,
     boolean isPrototype)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        g - The grid (passed to super constructor)
        c - The color of this agent (passed to super constructor)
        isPrototype - Is this a prototype agent from which all other agents of this type are made?

      • Agent

        public Agent(Agent parent,
     boolean isPrototype)
        Clone constructor. Will create a deep clone with every instance variable copied, not just references.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent from which to clone.

      • removeTrigger

        public void removeTrigger(int priority)
        Removes a trigger with the given priority (index in array list). If this is the prototype Agent, will also remove the trigger from all children.
        Parameters:
        priority - The priority of the given trigger to remove.
